alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 7:58PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bannock, central Power and southwestern Bingham Counties through 845 PM MDT... At 757 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Neeley, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... American Falls, Neeley, American Falls Reservoir, Aberdeen and Pocatello Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region
